publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2369# Donald Gorrie: Public Access to the Parliamentâ€”That the Parliament considers that the layout of the Holyrood Parliament buildings should allow the easiest possible public access to the Parliament and simple arrangements for members of the public to meet MSPs and that it should be possible for any additional security measures introduced at times of crisis to be easily dismantled, and asks the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to report to the Parliament on this aspect of their work. Supported by: Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, John Farquhar Munro*, George Lyon*, Stewart Stevenson*, Alex Neil*, Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-2369# Public Access to the Parliament (lodged on 25 October 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2369# Public Access to the Parliament (lodged on 25 October 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2369# Public Access to the Parliament (lodged on 25 October 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2369# Public Access to the Parliament (lodged on 25 October 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2369# Public Access to the Parliament (lodged on 25 October 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2369# Public Access to the Parliament (lodged on 25 October 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
